page.title: 13Anglican Minister
page.content: Jim Woodhouse is the minister at the local Anglican Parish Church. {Q. How do you think All Saints Church {serves the people of the town?} A. Mainly by offering the worship of God regularly; the occasional offices like baptisms, weddings, funerals etc.. Myself and other members of the church are always available to serve in whatever way we can. {Q. Does the congrgation of the church {cover all age groups?} A. Yes, but it's stronger in some age groups than others. People from early middle age onwards seem to be the main part of the congregation, and it's significant that a lot of people come back to church as they have more responsibility in life eg. if they have a family. We lack people from the teenage to the thirties really.
